inviteContactToBubble(contact, bubble, isModerator, withInvitation, strReason) → {Invitation}

Create a new bubble and invite a user in
Parameters:
Name Type Description
contact Contact The contact to invite
bubble Bubble The bubble
isModerator boolean True to add a contact as a moderator of the bubble
withInvitation boolean If true, the contact will receive an invitation and will have to accept it before entering the bubble. False to force the contact directly in the bubble without sending an invitation.
strReason string The reason of the invitation (optional)
Source:
  • Bubbles.js, line 90
Returns:
The invitation sent
Type
Invitation
